webscript.shortname: Gets the status of a site invtation
webscript.description:
This webscript retrieves the status of a specific site invitation along with various contextual information. The response will look like: 
{
   "id": "activiti$2352",
   "key": "6799e2c3-92b5-47a9-87f0-6fc817504782",
   "siteShortName": "testsite",
   "siteTitle": "Test Site",
   "siteTenantId": "alfresco.com",
   "siteTenantTitle": "alfresco.com",
   "inviterEmail": "name.surname@domain.com",
   "inviterFirstName": "Name",
   "inviterLastName": "Surname",
   "inviteeEmail": "inv.itee@domain.com",
   "inviteeIsActivated": false,
   "response": ""
}
If the key or the invite_id are not valid a 404 is returned.
